name: nitrate salts production, for solar power application | nitrate salts, for solar power application | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19977/documentation

This activity represents the mixing of sodium nitrate, technical grade and potassium nitrate, technical grade to nitrate salts, for solar power application. Nitrate salts applied in the thermal storage systems of solar thermal parabolic trough plants, 50 MW, and solar tower power plant, 20 MW, constructed between 2010 and 2020 are commonly a mixture of 60% sodium nitrate and 40% potassium nitrate.

The activity starts with the input of sodium nitrate, technical grade and potassium nitrate, technical grade.

The activity ends with the nitrate salts mixture ready to be used in the thermal storage system of concentrating solar power plants.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products/2029:Manufacture of other chemical products n.e.c.

processDocumentation.timeDescription: For concentrating solar power plants constructed between 2010 and 2020 the applied nitrate salt mixture typically consists of 60% sodium nitrate and 40% potassium nitrate.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The mixture of nitrate salts is based on data from a solar tower plant and a parabolic through plant in South Africa.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: For concentrating solar power plants constructed between 2010 and 2020 the applied nitrate salt mixture typically consists of 60% sodium nitrate and 40% potassium nitrate.
